Reviews.Title: Budget Android Tablet a Great Value for the Price
Reviews.Author: Justin R. Germino "-Justin Germino"

logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo3BK4DEMQGIT6HcurrentClick) { return cv_mo3BK4DEMQGIT6HcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 2:39 MinsThis is a video benchmark of the Dragon Touch A97 using the AnTuTu Android Benchmarking program, you will see with this live video benchmark test that the Dragon Touch A97 has about the same scores as an Asus Transformer TF210 and 1st Generation Google Nexus 7, which based on these results is very impressive given the price of the Dragon Touch A97 Tablet. The Dragon Touch A97 has full access to Google Play and a MicroSD card slot for extra storage. It will more than suffice for most applications and games and we have extensively compared it to other tablets in it's class and it holds up very well. Price for performance makes the Dragon Touch A97 an excellent tablet for kids or as a 2nd tablet for the family, though it does lack Bluetooth so you will not be able to pair a Bluetooth keyboard or other Bluetooth device with this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great for the Price
Reviews.Author: GLADYS
Reviews.Content: The tablet is very fast and it works perfectly. Wi fi connection works great around all the house, easy to use

Reviews.Title: Work very good for 77years old !!
Reviews.Author: Mami Fraser
Reviews.Content: It was the present for my mother in law , and she is 77years old. Works very good for her. Big screen and voice search, she just need for checking email.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Brenda spangle
Reviews.Content: we love it  is an exceptional product works great have not had any issues with it very fast and downloads great also takes great pictures

Reviews.Title: No complaints yet.
Reviews.Author: JANE RICHARD
Reviews.Content: Got this tablet for my son. He is good with it. He plays lots of games. He likes that it has google play. Easy to use. Plenty of memory. Good size for holding in lap. Bright easy to read screen.

Reviews.Title: Dragon Touch
Reviews.Author: D. Cruse
Reviews.Content: I bought this mostly to throw in the car to have handy when I wanted to show pictures from a sd card. For that it works great, but other than that, it's totally crap. Most times it's slower than dial up when trying to connect to the internet and that's if it connects at all.

Reviews.Title: Really like the tablet, but.........
Reviews.Author: Gearhead
Reviews.Content: Picked this one because of the size and reviews.  Bought for my wife, but tiny documentation is mostly useless, and customer support even less so. I'm learning, but better know someone who is familiar with android.  I'm getting an Omni 10 for myself.......  Now that I've had it for a week or so, I'm upgrading this to 5 stars for the product itself, in spite of the lousy documentation.  With some help from friends and some trial and error, it does everything that I bought it for (for my wife) very well with satisfactory speed and ease;  if it wasn't for the fact that I need Windows for my purposes, I would buy another one of these for myself.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!!!
Reviews.Author: fh
Reviews.Content: It's a great tablet for entertainment, especially for kids. My kids absolutely love it! It's light and thin, yet it has a huge screen as well with great resolution! Very easy to download apps through Google Play Store. It also has a built-in camera and video, which my kids use a lot! No problems with packaging or delivery, the tablet arrived quickly and in excellent condition. Wonderful tablet and very affordable price! I would definitely recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: Hugh T. Dacus
Reviews.Content: The only downside of the tablet was the fact that it did not come with an instruction book. It works well but I am unsure how to do some things.

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality
Reviews.Author: David M. Watts
Reviews.Content: Poor quality overall.  2.5 mm male power plug bends easily.  Despite app killer management with 34% RAM usage,  battery will not charge unless device is completely off.  Fully charged battery lasts less than 1 hour with app killer RAM result of 34% and screen brightness dimmed to the lowest brightness level.  Screen viewing angle is limited.  Despite the 4.2.2 Jellybean op system and Google Play preinstalled, the ESPN app in the Google Play store is NOT compatible with this device per the message you get from Google Play when trying to install it. Speakers at full volume are barely audible.  Customer service is a prerecorded message asking you to leave voicemail.

Reviews.Title: Dragon touch tablet is good for the money
Reviews.Author: Gladys Snapke "David"
Reviews.Content: I like the tablet.  It works well and responds to commands.  Easy to use and set up.  The sound I found to be poor.  You have to use earbuds.  It was a good buy for the money.I did have to return the first one because it was flashing lights.  The turn around time was super to get it replaced.

Reviews.Title: Mrs. Pickens of Detroit says,
Reviews.Author: Suzanne Pickens
Reviews.Content: It was all I expected and some. It was lighting fast with the dual core processor. I would recommend this tablet to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Ergie
Reviews.Content: I had some problems with the other tables but this one is great thanks amazon for hooking me up with this one / now me may get a Phone table

Reviews.Title: We sent it back...
Reviews.Author: C. Freeman "Panther Fan"
Reviews.Content: I had trouble figuring out how to use this.  It may just be because I'm used to a using a computer and not a tablet.  It wouldn't keep a wireless connection in our home either.  We ended up returning it because it was too frustrating to deal with.

Reviews.Title: This product runs very well
Reviews.Author: Sujarwo
Reviews.Content: I get it and my son like it so much. The tab runs very well. The think that I am a little bit confuse at the first time is about the internal (8GB). THe fact is there is about 4GB internal memory and other storage 1.26GB available (free) in the tablet. Other than that, It is just a great stuff for my son.

Reviews.Title: dam good tablet for a beginer device!
Reviews.Author: velly
Reviews.Content: What I like about it most, is that it is very quick on start up,as well as speed it stacks to the iPad, very easily. Im really impressed with the awesome processer speed,it handles multi tasking pretty well surprisingly. The speed is the most noticeable. I plan to use this a displayTablit for my photography. only the camera is low for resolution, and the rotation is a little funny, are the only get ups I see, other than that, one other plus is that you can connect it to your TV HD via the cable on amazon, and with the custom keyboard and case, also on amazon, make it a fairly decent miniature laptop, for those trying to save a buck or two. All in all id  say this is very decent tablet.

Reviews.Title: great first tablet
Reviews.Author: Ash
Reviews.Content: so far so good... my wife loves it. I would recommend it if you are not looking for too much.

Reviews.Title: poor quality
Reviews.Author: S. Singh "SS"
Reviews.Content: May be I got defective piece.Back camera was completely unusable, very dark in low light and weird shine/contrast in normal light.Also touch screen doesn't work well, it clicks 6 out of 10 times when scrolling.I returned it in a week.

Reviews.Title: Not bad, but
Reviews.Author: Tanner Szanto
Reviews.Content: 3d gaming is a bit clipped and laggy and the wifi is lacking, but the screen is nice and it can handle some nice multi tasking.  However it fails with all styli I have tried,  seems pretty standard for dragon touch, sad for such a nice tablet to fail in such a key area.

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: Sergio Villaseñor
Reviews.Content: I've been having my Dragon Touch for over a month now and so far its great!!-web is fun to surf-games work-videos are okay, they did buffer a lot at first ,but not as much nowOver all its a good tablet and I do recommend it, but the reason I gave it 4 starts is because when open it and first turned it on it had dust under the screen on one of the corners , olso because when I tried to install candy crush it said that the app wasnt compatible with the device. �

Reviews.Title: Don't Buy
Reviews.Author: Ashleigh Cameron
Reviews.Content: It is only a 4GB. It also has bad resolution. Just spend 20 dollars more for the nexus 7 1st generation. The camera on this is bad quality. The only good things about it are price and screen size. Returning ASAP.

Reviews.Title: Camera problem solved
Reviews.Author: Ricki D. Blackford
Reviews.Content: Had some problems with camera app stopping and having to restore system. Finally tracked it down to the "App Killer" that is recommended to install to cut back on battery use. It forces the camera and viewing apps to stop. In turn that disables the camera. Also do not let the play store automatically update your apps. Instead check each update to see what access it requires. If you see where it will affect your camera, do not update it. Not sure if that will disable the camera or not but not taking the chance. I use this for e-books, email, browsing, game play, photos, and dozens of other things. Works as expected. The next step up to the quad core tablet would probably do better for a power user if needed. One more complaint, the charger sometimes causes the touchscreen to "press" buttons other than the one I actually pressed when plugged in and using. I find that if I "ground" a finger or hand on the back of the unit, then this does not happen. I am assuming this is because of the small charger pin not making a tight contact within the pin hole. I may try replacing the charger unit or buying an extension for the low voltage wire.

Reviews.Title: SO FAR, SO GOOD
Reviews.Author: blondiebiker
Reviews.Content: I ORDERED 4 OF THE 9.7 INCH AND ONE 7 INCH DRAGON TOUCH TABLETS.  VERY EASY TO SET UP.  WAS KINDA SCARED ABOUT SOME OF THE BAD REVIEWS, BUT, SO FAR SO GOOD.  WHAT A GREAT LITTLE TABLET!!  I AM SO GLAD I WAITED AND DIDNT BUY AND EXPENSIVE NAME BRAND.  THIS DOES EVERYTHING WE WANT IT TO DO, IF YOU ARE ON THE FENCE AND DO NOT WANT TO PAY FOR THE A NAME AND S NAME, GO FOR THIS.

Reviews.Title: more than I expected
Reviews.Author: J. Eubank
Reviews.Content: I expected something average, just a plain tablet that might not do a lot. But actually it works really well, and runs the android apps I need, and seems to be solidly made. I really like it.

Reviews.Title: DONT BUY THIS!!
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: I read all the reviews. And this tablet is far from 4 stars :(. I purchased this for my 7 yr old son. I had to send the first one back because it appeared to be used and not new. It had a weird dusting in the entire box and the screen was scratched. The second one came and didn't look any better but was not willing to fight it. It is extremely slow, took 20+ minutes to download simple apps like Temple Run, Flappy Bird, ect. And the battery life it terrible. Like only 2 hours terrible. Then it takes 6 hours to fully charge it. The sound is terrible but that really didn't matter because we couldn't watch anything on Netflix because its to dang slow. DONT BUY THIS!!!!

Reviews.Title: Dragon Touch® A97 9.7''
Reviews.Author: Blair Ingram
Reviews.Content: I've had this Tablet about 3 weeks, and I haven't had any problems whatsoever!! It serves my purpose quite well. I'll primarily use it to browse the web and check email. I found it to be quite responsive. Highly recommend as a startup Tablet for anyone

Reviews.Title: Very weak Wi Fi antenna
Reviews.Author: jules
Reviews.Content: The tablet looks great and works great, unless you are not sitting right next to your modem. It could not find our wifi network in the next room. It was returned.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Susan Rogers
Reviews.Content: Everything I expected in a tablet at half of the price I thought I would have to spend on it.

Reviews.Title: very happy with it
Reviews.Author: tiffy
Reviews.Content: it does what i want and then sum, my kids hv the desktop and i hv this, its fast, and portable....i luv it.

Reviews.Title: works good :)
Reviews.Author: becky alford
Reviews.Content: Love it works good so far got it for my birthday from my husband to Skype on so far so good :)

Reviews.Title: best tablet ever
Reviews.Author: Arbi
Reviews.Content: gorgeous camerabpugh this for my g f and she loving iti got one two and works like a bosssuper fast

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Dillon Cowden
Reviews.Content: U i see it is good for price wifii could be better but other then that all and all good
